generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and traffic, including cars and tram tracks.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area next to the road, separated by curbs and poles, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings with distinct architectural features, including windows and roofs, are visible along the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the image, particularly on the right side and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and near the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the side.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Stopping" sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the left side of the image.
